This will be the thread to make the space lounge, The Space Lounge!

Post things that aren't big enough for a thread, but are still cool.

So I found out driving a rover and then jumping off somewhere and then hit hack gravity is fun
Elephants are the only mammals with four knees.

Really? Dang, elephants are cool

Elephants are the only mammals with four knees.

Elephants are the only mammals with four knees.
There's a popular internet factoid which states that the elephant is the only animal which has four knees. But it doesn't; it has two knees at the back, and elbows and wrists at the front, exactly like other quadrupeds.

From here: http://qi.com/infocloud/knees

Sorry to burst your bubble.

From here: http://qi.com/infocloud/knees

The A-10 Warthogs gatling gun produces 6 tonnes of recoil, but the engines only provide 5.

So if you fire long enough, you will just go backward?

Nice render. Did you make that model?

Nah. It's all ripped from the game. The jetpack is modeled by me, took the rover bodies and combined them with a chair. I think it looks better than the one we have now. Kerbal is ripped from the game, but the armature and cleanup is me. The Earth in the background is a really huge hdri made in space engine.
